00053 #ifdef _WIN32
00054 void tstart ( void )
00055 {}
00056 void tend ( void )
00057 {
00058 }
00059 double tval( void )
00060 {
00061     return 0;
00062 }
00063 #else
00064 #include <sys/time.h>
00065 static struct timeval _tstart, _tend;
00066 static struct timezone tz;
00067 void tstart ( void )
00068 {
00069     gettimeofday ( &_tstart, &tz );
00070 }
00071 void tend ( void )
00072 {
00073     gettimeofday ( &_tend,&tz );
00074 }
00075 double tval(void)
00076 {
00077     double t1, t2;
00078     t1 = ( double ) _tstart.tv_sec + ( double ) _tstart.tv_usec/ ( 1000*1000 );
00079     t2 = ( double ) _tend.tv_sec + ( double ) _tend.tv_usec/ ( 1000*1000 );
00080     return t2-t1;
00081 }
00082 #endif

00084 /* Our available solvers. */
00085 // 255 is the magic reserved number, so NEVER try to put 255 solvers in here!
00086 // 254 = MAX!
00087 static CM_SOLVER_DEF    solvers [] =
00088 {
00089     { "Implicit", CM_IMPLICIT, implicit_init, implicit_solver, implicit_free },
00090         // { "Implicit C++", CM_IMPLICITCPP, implicitcpp_init, implicitcpp_solver, implicitcpp_free },
00091 };

00103 /******************************************************************************
00104 *
00105 * External interface called by modifier.c clothModifier functions.
00106 *
00107 ******************************************************************************/
00114 void cloth_init ( ClothModifierData *clmd )
00115 {   
00116     /* Initialize our new data structure to reasonable values. */
00117     clmd->sim_parms->gravity[0] = 0.0;
00118     clmd->sim_parms->gravity[1] = 0.0;
00119     clmd->sim_parms->gravity[2] = -9.81;
00120     clmd->sim_parms->structural = 15.0;
00121     clmd->sim_parms->shear = 15.0;
00122     clmd->sim_parms->bending = 0.5;
00123     clmd->sim_parms->Cdis = 5.0; 
00124     clmd->sim_parms->Cvi = 1.0;
00125     clmd->sim_parms->mass = 0.3f;
00126     clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame = 5;
00127     clmd->sim_parms->flags = 0;
00128     clmd->sim_parms->solver_type = 0;
00129     clmd->sim_parms->preroll = 0;
00130     clmd->sim_parms->maxspringlen = 10;
00131     clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_mass = 0;
00132     clmd->sim_parms->avg_spring_len = 0.0;
00133     clmd->sim_parms->presets = 2; /* cotton as start setting */
00134     clmd->sim_parms->timescale = 1.0f; /* speed factor, describes how fast cloth moves */
00135     clmd->sim_parms->reset = 0;
00136     clmd->sim_parms->vel_damping = 1.0f; /* 1.0 = no damping, 0.0 = fully dampened */
00137     
00138     clmd->coll_parms->self_friction = 5.0;
00139     clmd->coll_parms->friction = 5.0;
00140     clmd->coll_parms->loop_count = 2;
00141     clmd->coll_parms->epsilon = 0.015f;
00142     clmd->coll_parms->flags = CLOTH_COLLSETTINGS_FLAG_ENABLED;
00143     clmd->coll_parms->collision_list = NULL;
00144     clmd->coll_parms->self_loop_count = 1.0;
00145     clmd->coll_parms->selfepsilon = 0.75;
00146 
00147     /* These defaults are copied from softbody.c's
00148     * softbody_calc_forces() function.
00149     */
00150     clmd->sim_parms->eff_force_scale = 1000.0;
00151     clmd->sim_parms->eff_wind_scale = 250.0;
00152 
00153     // also from softbodies
00154     clmd->sim_parms->maxgoal = 1.0f;
00155     clmd->sim_parms->mingoal = 0.0f;
00156     clmd->sim_parms->defgoal = 0.0f;
00157     clmd->sim_parms->goalspring = 1.0f;
00158     clmd->sim_parms->goalfrict = 0.0f;
00159     clmd->sim_parms->velocity_smooth = 0.0f;
00160 
00161     if (!clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights)
00162         clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights = BKE_add_effector_weights(NULL);
00163 
00164     if (clmd->point_cache)
00165         clmd->point_cache->step = 1;
00166 }

00168 static BVHTree *bvhselftree_build_from_cloth (ClothModifierData *clmd, float epsilon)
00169 {
00170     unsigned int i;
00171     BVHTree *bvhtree;
00172     Cloth *cloth;
00173     ClothVertex *verts;
00174     float co[12];
00175 
00176     if (!clmd)
00177         return NULL;
00178 
00179     cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00180 
00181     if (!cloth)
00182         return NULL;
00183     
00184     verts = cloth->verts;
00185     
00186     // in the moment, return zero if no faces there
00187     if (!cloth->numverts)
00188         return NULL;
00189     
00190     // create quadtree with k=26
00191     bvhtree = BLI_bvhtree_new(cloth->numverts, epsilon, 4, 6);
00192     
00193     // fill tree
00194     for (i = 0; i < cloth->numverts; i++, verts++)
00195     {
00196         copy_v3_v3(&co[0*3], verts->xold);
00197         
00198         BLI_bvhtree_insert(bvhtree, i, co, 1);
00199     }
00200     
00201     // balance tree
00202     BLI_bvhtree_balance(bvhtree);
00203     
00204     return bvhtree;
00205 }
00206 
00207 static BVHTree *bvhtree_build_from_cloth (ClothModifierData *clmd, float epsilon)
00208 {
00209     unsigned int i;
00210     BVHTree *bvhtree;
00211     Cloth *cloth;
00212     ClothVertex *verts;
00213     MFace *mfaces;
00214     float co[12];
00215 
00216     if (!clmd)
00217         return NULL;
00218 
00219     cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00220 
00221     if (!cloth)
00222         return NULL;
00223     
00224     verts = cloth->verts;
00225     mfaces = cloth->mfaces;
00226     
00227     // in the moment, return zero if no faces there
00228     if (!cloth->numfaces)
00229         return NULL;
00230     
00231     // create quadtree with k=26
00232     bvhtree = BLI_bvhtree_new(cloth->numfaces, epsilon, 4, 26);
00233     
00234     // fill tree
00235     for (i = 0; i < cloth->numfaces; i++, mfaces++)
00236     {
00237         copy_v3_v3(&co[0*3], verts[mfaces->v1].xold);
00238         copy_v3_v3(&co[1*3], verts[mfaces->v2].xold);
00239         copy_v3_v3(&co[2*3], verts[mfaces->v3].xold);
00240         
00241         if (mfaces->v4)
00242             copy_v3_v3(&co[3*3], verts[mfaces->v4].xold);
00243         
00244         BLI_bvhtree_insert(bvhtree, i, co, (mfaces->v4 ? 4 : 3));
00245     }
00246     
00247     // balance tree
00248     BLI_bvhtree_balance(bvhtree);
00249     
00250     return bvhtree;
00251 }
00252 
00253 void bvhtree_update_from_cloth(ClothModifierData *clmd, int moving)
00254 {   
00255     unsigned int i = 0;
00256     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00257     BVHTree *bvhtree = cloth->bvhtree;
00258     ClothVertex *verts = cloth->verts;
00259     MFace *mfaces;
00260     float co[12], co_moving[12];
00261     int ret = 0;
00262     
00263     if (!bvhtree)
00264         return;
00265     
00266     mfaces = cloth->mfaces;
00267     
00268     // update vertex position in bvh tree
00269     if (verts && mfaces)
00270     {
00271         for (i = 0; i < cloth->numfaces; i++, mfaces++)
00272         {
00273             copy_v3_v3(&co[0*3], verts[mfaces->v1].txold);
00274             copy_v3_v3(&co[1*3], verts[mfaces->v2].txold);
00275             copy_v3_v3(&co[2*3], verts[mfaces->v3].txold);
00276             
00277             if (mfaces->v4)
00278                 copy_v3_v3(&co[3*3], verts[mfaces->v4].txold);
00279         
00280             // copy new locations into array
00281             if (moving)
00282             {
00283                 // update moving positions
00284                 copy_v3_v3(&co_moving[0*3], verts[mfaces->v1].tx);
00285                 copy_v3_v3(&co_moving[1*3], verts[mfaces->v2].tx);
00286                 copy_v3_v3(&co_moving[2*3], verts[mfaces->v3].tx);
00287                 
00288                 if (mfaces->v4)
00289                     copy_v3_v3(&co_moving[3*3], verts[mfaces->v4].tx);
00290                 
00291                 ret = BLI_bvhtree_update_node(bvhtree, i, co, co_moving, (mfaces->v4 ? 4 : 3));
00292             }
00293             else {
00294                 ret = BLI_bvhtree_update_node(bvhtree, i, co, NULL, (mfaces->v4 ? 4 : 3));
00295             }
00296             
00297             // check if tree is already full
00298             if (!ret)
00299                 break;
00300         }
00301         
00302         BLI_bvhtree_update_tree(bvhtree);
00303     }
00304 }
00305 
00306 void bvhselftree_update_from_cloth(ClothModifierData *clmd, int moving)
00307 {   
00308     unsigned int i = 0;
00309     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00310     BVHTree *bvhtree = cloth->bvhselftree;
00311     ClothVertex *verts = cloth->verts;
00312     MFace *mfaces;
00313     float co[12], co_moving[12];
00314     int ret = 0;
00315     
00316     if (!bvhtree)
00317         return;
00318     
00319     mfaces = cloth->mfaces;
00320     
00321     // update vertex position in bvh tree
00322     if (verts && mfaces)
00323     {
00324         for (i = 0; i < cloth->numverts; i++, verts++)
00325         {
00326             copy_v3_v3(&co[0*3], verts->txold);
00327             
00328             // copy new locations into array
00329             if (moving)
00330             {
00331                 // update moving positions
00332                 copy_v3_v3(&co_moving[0*3], verts->tx);
00333                 
00334                 ret = BLI_bvhtree_update_node(bvhtree, i, co, co_moving, 1);
00335             }
00336             else {
00337                 ret = BLI_bvhtree_update_node(bvhtree, i, co, NULL, 1);
00338             }
00339             
00340             // check if tree is already full
00341             if (!ret)
00342                 break;
00343         }
00344         
00345         BLI_bvhtree_update_tree(bvhtree);
00346     }
00347 }
00348 
00349 void cloth_clear_cache(Object *ob, ClothModifierData *clmd, float framenr)
00350 {
00351     PTCacheID pid;
00352     
00353     BKE_ptcache_id_from_cloth(&pid, ob, clmd);
00354 
00355     // don't do anything as long as we're in editmode!
00356     if (pid.cache->edit && ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)
00357         return;
00358     
00359     BKE_ptcache_id_clear(&pid, PTCACHE_CLEAR_AFTER, framenr);
00360 }
00361 
00362 static int do_init_cloth(Object *ob, ClothModifierData *clmd, DerivedMesh *result, int framenr)
00363 {
00364     PointCache *cache;
00365 
00366     cache= clmd->point_cache;
00367 
00368     /* initialize simulation data if it didn't exist already */
00369     if (clmd->clothObject == NULL) {    
00370         if (!cloth_from_object(ob, clmd, result, framenr, 1)) {
00371             BKE_ptcache_invalidate(cache);
00372             return 0;
00373         }
00374     
00375         if (clmd->clothObject == NULL) {
00376             BKE_ptcache_invalidate(cache);
00377             return 0;
00378         }
00379     
00380         implicit_set_positions(clmd);
00381 
00382         clmd->clothObject->last_frame= MINFRAME-1;
00383     }
00384 
00385     return 1;
00386 }
00387 
00388 static int do_step_cloth(Object *ob, ClothModifierData *clmd, DerivedMesh *result, int framenr)
00389 {
00390     ClothVertex *verts = NULL;
00391     Cloth *cloth;
00392     ListBase *effectors = NULL;
00393     MVert *mvert;
00394     unsigned int i = 0;
00395     int ret = 0;
00396 
00397     /* simulate 1 frame forward */
00398     cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00399     verts = cloth->verts;
00400     mvert = result->getVertArray(result);
00401 
00402     /* force any pinned verts to their constrained location. */
00403     for (i = 0; i < clmd->clothObject->numverts; i++, verts++) {
00404         /* save the previous position. */
00405         copy_v3_v3(verts->xold, verts->xconst);
00406         copy_v3_v3(verts->txold, verts->x);
00407 
00408         /* Get the current position. */
00409         copy_v3_v3(verts->xconst, mvert[i].co);
00410         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, verts->xconst);
00411     }
00412 
00413     effectors = pdInitEffectors(clmd->scene, ob, NULL, clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights);
00414     
00415     tstart();
00416 
00417     /* call the solver. */
00418     if (solvers [clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].solver)
00419         ret = solvers[clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].solver(ob, framenr, clmd, effectors);
00420 
00421     tend();
00422 
00423     pdEndEffectors(&effectors);
00424 
00425     // printf ( "%f\n", ( float ) tval() );
00426     
00427     return ret;
00428 }
00429 
00430 /************************************************
00431  * clothModifier_do - main simulation function
00432 ************************************************/
00433 void clothModifier_do(ClothModifierData *clmd, Scene *scene, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, float (*vertexCos)[3])
00434 {
00435     PointCache *cache;
00436     PTCacheID pid;
00437     float timescale;
00438     int framenr, startframe, endframe;
00439     int cache_result;
00440 
00441     clmd->scene= scene; /* nice to pass on later :) */
00442     framenr= (int)scene->r.cfra;
00443     cache= clmd->point_cache;
00444 
00445     BKE_ptcache_id_from_cloth(&pid, ob, clmd);
00446     BKE_ptcache_id_time(&pid, scene, framenr, &startframe, &endframe, &timescale);
00447     clmd->sim_parms->timescale= timescale;
00448 
00449     if (clmd->sim_parms->reset ||
00450         (framenr == (startframe - clmd->sim_parms->preroll) && clmd->sim_parms->preroll != 0) ||
00451         (clmd->clothObject && dm->getNumVerts(dm) != clmd->clothObject->numverts))
00452     {
00453         clmd->sim_parms->reset = 0;
00454         cache->flag |= PTCACHE_OUTDATED;
00455         BKE_ptcache_id_reset(scene, &pid, PTCACHE_RESET_OUTDATED);
00456         BKE_ptcache_validate(cache, 0);
00457         cache->last_exact= 0;
00458         cache->flag &= ~PTCACHE_REDO_NEEDED;
00459         return;
00460     }
00461     
00462     // unused in the moment, calculated separately in implicit.c
00463     clmd->sim_parms->dt = clmd->sim_parms->timescale / clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame;
00464 
00465     /* handle continuous simulation with the play button */
00466     if (BKE_ptcache_get_continue_physics() || ((clmd->sim_parms->preroll > 0) && (framenr > startframe - clmd->sim_parms->preroll) && (framenr < startframe))) {
00467         BKE_ptcache_invalidate(cache);
00468 
00469         /* do simulation */
00470         if (!do_init_cloth(ob, clmd, dm, framenr))
00471             return;
00472 
00473         do_step_cloth(ob, clmd, dm, framenr);
00474         cloth_to_object(ob, clmd, vertexCos);
00475 
00476         clmd->clothObject->last_frame= framenr;
00477 
00478         return;
00479     }
00480 
00481     /* simulation is only active during a specific period */
00482     if (framenr < startframe) {
00483         BKE_ptcache_invalidate(cache);
00484         return;
00485     }
00486     else if (framenr > endframe) {
00487         framenr= endframe;
00488     }
00489 
00490     /* initialize simulation data if it didn't exist already */
00491     if (!do_init_cloth(ob, clmd, dm, framenr))
00492         return;
00493 
00494     if ((framenr == startframe) && (clmd->sim_parms->preroll == 0)) {
00495         BKE_ptcache_id_reset(scene, &pid, PTCACHE_RESET_OUTDATED);
00496         do_init_cloth(ob, clmd, dm, framenr);
00497         BKE_ptcache_validate(cache, framenr);
00498         cache->flag &= ~PTCACHE_REDO_NEEDED;
00499         clmd->clothObject->last_frame= framenr;
00500         return;
00501     }
00502 
00503     /* try to read from cache */
00504     cache_result = BKE_ptcache_read(&pid, (float)framenr+scene->r.subframe);
00505 
00506     if (cache_result == PTCACHE_READ_EXACT || cache_result == PTCACHE_READ_INTERPOLATED) {
00507         implicit_set_positions(clmd);
00508         cloth_to_object (ob, clmd, vertexCos);
00509 
00510         BKE_ptcache_validate(cache, framenr);
00511 
00512         if (cache_result == PTCACHE_READ_INTERPOLATED && cache->flag & PTCACHE_REDO_NEEDED)
00513             BKE_ptcache_write(&pid, framenr);
00514 
00515         clmd->clothObject->last_frame= framenr;
00516 
00517         return;
00518     }
00519     else if (cache_result==PTCACHE_READ_OLD) {
00520         implicit_set_positions(clmd);
00521     }
00522     else if ( /*ob->id.lib ||*/ (cache->flag & PTCACHE_BAKED)) { /* 2.4x disabled lib, but this can be used in some cases, testing further - campbell */
00523         /* if baked and nothing in cache, do nothing */
00524         BKE_ptcache_invalidate(cache);
00525         return;
00526     }
00527 
00528     if (framenr!=clmd->clothObject->last_frame+1)
00529         return;
00530 
00531     /* if on second frame, write cache for first frame */
00532     if (cache->simframe == startframe && (cache->flag & PTCACHE_OUTDATED || cache->last_exact==0))
00533         BKE_ptcache_write(&pid, startframe);
00534 
00535     clmd->sim_parms->timescale *= framenr - cache->simframe;
00536 
00537     /* do simulation */
00538     BKE_ptcache_validate(cache, framenr);
00539 
00540     if (!do_step_cloth(ob, clmd, dm, framenr)) {
00541         BKE_ptcache_invalidate(cache);
00542     }
00543     else
00544         BKE_ptcache_write(&pid, framenr);
00545 
00546     cloth_to_object (ob, clmd, vertexCos);
00547     clmd->clothObject->last_frame= framenr;
00548 }
00549 
00550 /* frees all */
00551 void cloth_free_modifier(ClothModifierData *clmd )
00552 {
00553     Cloth   *cloth = NULL;
00554     
00555     if ( !clmd )
00556         return;
00557 
00558     cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00559 
00560     
00561     if ( cloth )
00562     {   
00563         // If our solver provides a free function, call it
00564         if ( solvers [clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].free )
00565         {
00566             solvers [clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].free ( clmd );
00567         }
00568 
00569         // Free the verts.
00570         if ( cloth->verts != NULL )
00571             MEM_freeN ( cloth->verts );
00572 
00573         cloth->verts = NULL;
00574         cloth->numverts = 0;
00575 
00576         // Free the springs.
00577         if ( cloth->springs != NULL )
00578         {
00579             LinkNode *search = cloth->springs;
00580             while (search)
00581             {
00582                 ClothSpring *spring = search->link;
00583                         
00584                 MEM_freeN ( spring );
00585                 search = search->next;
00586             }
00587             BLI_linklist_free(cloth->springs, NULL);
00588         
00589             cloth->springs = NULL;
00590         }
00591 
00592         cloth->springs = NULL;
00593         cloth->numsprings = 0;
00594 
00595         // free BVH collision tree
00596         if ( cloth->bvhtree )
00597             BLI_bvhtree_free ( cloth->bvhtree );
00598         
00599         if ( cloth->bvhselftree )
00600             BLI_bvhtree_free ( cloth->bvhselftree );
00601 
00602         // we save our faces for collision objects
00603         if ( cloth->mfaces )
00604             MEM_freeN ( cloth->mfaces );
00605         
00606         if (cloth->edgehash)
00607             BLI_edgehash_free ( cloth->edgehash, NULL );
00608         
00609         
00610         /*
00611         if (clmd->clothObject->facemarks)
00612         MEM_freeN(clmd->clothObject->facemarks);
00613         */
00614         MEM_freeN ( cloth );
00615         clmd->clothObject = NULL;
00616     }
00617 }
00618 
00619 /* frees all */
00620 void cloth_free_modifier_extern ( ClothModifierData *clmd )
00621 {
00622     Cloth   *cloth = NULL;
00623     if (G.rt > 0)
00624         printf("cloth_free_modifier_extern\n");
00625     
00626     if ( !clmd )
00627         return;
00628 
00629     cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00630     
00631     if ( cloth )
00632     {   
00633         if (G.rt > 0)
00634             printf("cloth_free_modifier_extern in\n");
00635         
00636         // If our solver provides a free function, call it
00637         if ( solvers [clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].free )
00638         {
00639             solvers [clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].free ( clmd );
00640         }
00641 
00642         // Free the verts.
00643         if ( cloth->verts != NULL )
00644             MEM_freeN ( cloth->verts );
00645 
00646         cloth->verts = NULL;
00647         cloth->numverts = 0;
00648 
00649         // Free the springs.
00650         if ( cloth->springs != NULL )
00651         {
00652             LinkNode *search = cloth->springs;
00653             while (search)
00654             {
00655                 ClothSpring *spring = search->link;
00656                         
00657                 MEM_freeN ( spring );
00658                 search = search->next;
00659             }
00660             BLI_linklist_free(cloth->springs, NULL);
00661         
00662             cloth->springs = NULL;
00663         }
00664 
00665         cloth->springs = NULL;
00666         cloth->numsprings = 0;
00667 
00668         // free BVH collision tree
00669         if ( cloth->bvhtree )
00670             BLI_bvhtree_free ( cloth->bvhtree );
00671         
00672         if ( cloth->bvhselftree )
00673             BLI_bvhtree_free ( cloth->bvhselftree );
00674 
00675         // we save our faces for collision objects
00676         if ( cloth->mfaces )
00677             MEM_freeN ( cloth->mfaces );
00678         
00679         if (cloth->edgehash)
00680             BLI_edgehash_free ( cloth->edgehash, NULL );
00681         
00682         
00683         /*
00684         if (clmd->clothObject->facemarks)
00685         MEM_freeN(clmd->clothObject->facemarks);
00686         */
00687         MEM_freeN ( cloth );
00688         clmd->clothObject = NULL;
00689     }
00690 }
00691 
00692 /******************************************************************************
00693 *
00694 * Internal functions.
00695 *
00696 ******************************************************************************/
00697 
00702 static void cloth_to_object (Object *ob,  ClothModifierData *clmd, float (*vertexCos)[3])
00703 {
00704     unsigned int    i = 0;
00705     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00706 
00707     if (clmd->clothObject) {
00708         /* inverse matrix is not uptodate... */
00709         invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00710 
00711         for (i = 0; i < cloth->numverts; i++)
00712         {
00713             copy_v3_v3 (vertexCos[i], cloth->verts[i].x);
00714             mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, vertexCos[i]);  /* cloth is in global coords */
00715         }
00716     }
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00720 int cloth_uses_vgroup(ClothModifierData *clmd)
00721 {
00722     return (((clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_SCALING ) || 
00723         (clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL )) && 
00724         ((clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_mass>0) || 
00725         (clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_struct>0)||
00726         (clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_bend>0)));
00727 }
00728 
00733 /* can be optimized to do all groups in one loop */
00734 static void cloth_apply_vgroup ( ClothModifierData *clmd, DerivedMesh *dm )
00735 {
00736     int i = 0;
00737     int j = 0;
00738     MDeformVert *dvert = NULL;
00739     Cloth *clothObj = NULL;
00740     int numverts;
00741     /* float goalfac = 0; */ /* UNUSED */
00742     ClothVertex *verts = NULL;
00743 
00744     if (!clmd || !dm) return;
00745 
00746     clothObj = clmd->clothObject;
00747 
00748     numverts = dm->getNumVerts ( dm );
00749 
00750     verts = clothObj->verts;
00751     
00752     if (cloth_uses_vgroup(clmd))
00753     {
00754         for ( i = 0; i < numverts; i++, verts++ )
00755         {   
00756             dvert = dm->getVertData ( dm, i, CD_MDEFORMVERT );
00757             if ( dvert )
00758             {
00759                 for ( j = 0; j < dvert->totweight; j++ )
00760                 {
00761                     if (( dvert->dw[j].def_nr == (clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_mass-1)) && (clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL ))
00762                     {
00763                         verts->goal = dvert->dw [j].weight;
00764                         /* goalfac= 1.0f; */ /* UNUSED */
00765                         
00766                         /*
00767                         // Kicking goal factor to simplify things...who uses that anyway?
00768                         // ABS ( clmd->sim_parms->maxgoal - clmd->sim_parms->mingoal );
00769                         */
00770                         
00771                         verts->goal  = ( float ) pow ( verts->goal , 4.0f );
00772                         if ( verts->goal >=SOFTGOALSNAP )
00773                         {
00774                              verts->flags |= CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED;
00775                         }
00776                     }
00777                     
00778                     if (clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_SCALING )
00779                     {
00780                         if ( dvert->dw[j].def_nr == (clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_struct-1))
00781                         {
00782                             verts->struct_stiff = dvert->dw [j].weight;
00783                             verts->shear_stiff = dvert->dw [j].weight;
00784                         }
00785                         
00786                         if ( dvert->dw[j].def_nr == (clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_bend-1))
00787                         {
00788                             verts->bend_stiff = dvert->dw [j].weight;
00789                         }
00790                     }
00791                     /*
00792                     // for later
00793                     if ( dvert->dw[j].def_nr == (clmd->sim_parms->vgroup_weight-1))
00794                     {
00795                         verts->mass = dvert->dw [j].weight;
00796                     }
00797                     */
00798                 }
00799             }
00800         }
00801     }
00802 }
00803 
00804 static int cloth_from_object(Object *ob, ClothModifierData *clmd, DerivedMesh *dm, float UNUSED(framenr), int first)
00805 {
00806     int i = 0;
00807     MVert *mvert = NULL;
00808     ClothVertex *verts = NULL;
00809     float (*shapekey_rest)[3]= NULL;
00810     float tnull[3] = {0,0,0};
00811     Cloth *cloth = NULL;
00812     float maxdist = 0;
00813 
00814     // If we have a clothObject, free it. 
00815     if ( clmd->clothObject != NULL )
00816     {
00817         cloth_free_modifier ( clmd );
00818         if (G.rt > 0)
00819             printf("cloth_free_modifier cloth_from_object\n");
00820     }
00821 
00822     // Allocate a new cloth object.
00823     clmd->clothObject = MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( Cloth ), "cloth" );
00824     if ( clmd->clothObject )
00825     {
00826         clmd->clothObject->old_solver_type = 255;
00827         // clmd->clothObject->old_collision_type = 255;
00828         cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00829         clmd->clothObject->edgehash = NULL;
00830     }
00831     else if (!clmd->clothObject) {
00832         modifier_setError(&(clmd->modifier), "%s", TIP_("Out of memory on allocating clmd->clothObject."));
00833         return 0;
00834     }
00835 
00836     // mesh input objects need DerivedMesh
00837     if ( !dm )
00838         return 0;
00839 
00840     cloth_from_mesh ( clmd, dm );
00841 
00842     // create springs 
00843     clmd->clothObject->springs = NULL;
00844     clmd->clothObject->numsprings = -1;
00845     
00846     if ( clmd->sim_parms->shapekey_rest )
00847         shapekey_rest = dm->getVertDataArray ( dm, CD_CLOTH_ORCO );
00848 
00849     mvert = dm->getVertArray ( dm );
00850 
00851     verts = clmd->clothObject->verts;
00852 
00853     // set initial values
00854     for ( i = 0; i < dm->getNumVerts(dm); i++, verts++ )
00855     {
00856         if (first)
00857         {
00858             copy_v3_v3( verts->x, mvert[i].co );
00859 
00860             mul_m4_v3( ob->obmat, verts->x );
00861 
00862             if ( shapekey_rest ) {
00863                 verts->xrest= shapekey_rest[i];
00864                 mul_m4_v3( ob->obmat, verts->xrest );
00865             }
00866             else
00867                 verts->xrest = verts->x;
00868         }
00869         
00870         /* no GUI interface yet */
00871         verts->mass = clmd->sim_parms->mass; 
00872         verts->impulse_count = 0;
00873 
00874         if ( clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL )
00875             verts->goal= clmd->sim_parms->defgoal;
00876         else
00877             verts->goal= 0.0f;
00878 
00879         verts->flags = 0;
00880         copy_v3_v3 ( verts->xold, verts->x );
00881         copy_v3_v3 ( verts->xconst, verts->x );
00882         copy_v3_v3 ( verts->txold, verts->x );
00883         copy_v3_v3 ( verts->tx, verts->x );
00884         mul_v3_fl( verts->v, 0.0f );
00885 
00886         verts->impulse_count = 0;
00887         copy_v3_v3 ( verts->impulse, tnull );
00888     }
00889     
00890     // apply / set vertex groups
00891     // has to be happen before springs are build!
00892     cloth_apply_vgroup (clmd, dm);
00893 
00894     if ( !cloth_build_springs ( clmd, dm ) )
00895     {
00896         cloth_free_modifier ( clmd );
00897         modifier_setError(&(clmd->modifier), "%s", TIP_("Can't build springs."));
00898         printf("cloth_free_modifier cloth_build_springs\n");
00899         return 0;
00900     }
00901     
00902     for ( i = 0; i < dm->getNumVerts(dm); i++)
00903     {
00904         if ((!(cloth->verts[i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED)) && (cloth->verts[i].goal > ALMOST_ZERO))
00905         {
00906             cloth_add_spring (clmd, i, i, 0.0, CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_GOAL);
00907         }
00908     }
00909     
00910     // init our solver
00911     if ( solvers [clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].init ) {
00912         solvers [clmd->sim_parms->solver_type].init ( ob, clmd );
00913     }
00914     
00915     if (!first)
00916         implicit_set_positions(clmd);
00917 
00918     clmd->clothObject->bvhtree = bvhtree_build_from_cloth ( clmd, MAX2(clmd->coll_parms->epsilon, clmd->coll_parms->distance_repel) );
00919     
00920     for (i = 0; i < dm->getNumVerts(dm); i++)
00921     {
00922         maxdist = MAX2(maxdist, clmd->coll_parms->selfepsilon* ( cloth->verts[i].avg_spring_len*2.0f));
00923     }
00924     
00925     clmd->clothObject->bvhselftree = bvhselftree_build_from_cloth ( clmd, maxdist );
00926 
00927     return 1;
00928 }
00929 
00930 static void cloth_from_mesh ( ClothModifierData *clmd, DerivedMesh *dm )
00931 {
00932     unsigned int numverts = dm->getNumVerts ( dm );
00933     unsigned int numfaces = dm->getNumTessFaces ( dm );
00934     MFace *mface = dm->getTessFaceArray( dm );
00935     unsigned int i = 0;
00936 
00937     /* Allocate our vertices. */
00938     clmd->clothObject->numverts = numverts;
00939     clmd->clothObject->verts = MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( ClothVertex ) * clmd->clothObject->numverts, "clothVertex" );
00940     if ( clmd->clothObject->verts == NULL )
00941     {
00942         cloth_free_modifier ( clmd );
00943         modifier_setError(&(clmd->modifier), "%s", TIP_("Out of memory on allocating clmd->clothObject->verts."));
00944         printf("cloth_free_modifier clmd->clothObject->verts\n");
00945         return;
00946     }
00947 
00948     // save face information
00949     clmd->clothObject->numfaces = numfaces;
00950     clmd->clothObject->mfaces = MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( MFace ) * clmd->clothObject->numfaces, "clothMFaces" );
00951     if ( clmd->clothObject->mfaces == NULL )
00952     {
00953         cloth_free_modifier ( clmd );
00954         modifier_setError(&(clmd->modifier), "%s", TIP_("Out of memory on allocating clmd->clothObject->mfaces."));
00955         printf("cloth_free_modifier clmd->clothObject->mfaces\n");
00956         return;
00957     }
00958     for ( i = 0; i < numfaces; i++ )
00959         memcpy ( &clmd->clothObject->mfaces[i], &mface[i], sizeof ( MFace ) );
00960 
00961     /* Free the springs since they can't be correct if the vertices
00962     * changed.
00963     */
00964     if ( clmd->clothObject->springs != NULL )
00965         MEM_freeN ( clmd->clothObject->springs );
00966 
00967 }
00968 
00969 /***************************************************************************************
00970 * SPRING NETWORK BUILDING IMPLEMENTATION BEGIN
00971 ***************************************************************************************/
00972 
00973 // be careful: implicit solver has to be resettet when using this one!
00974 // --> only for implicit handling of this spring!
00975 int cloth_add_spring ( ClothModifierData *clmd, unsigned int indexA, unsigned int indexB, float restlength, int spring_type)
00976 {
00977     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00978     ClothSpring *spring = NULL;
00979     
00980     if (cloth)
00981     {
00982         // TODO: look if this spring is already there
00983         
00984         spring = ( ClothSpring * ) MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( ClothSpring ), "cloth spring" );
00985         
00986         if (!spring)
00987             return 0;
00988         
00989         spring->ij = indexA;
00990         spring->kl = indexB;
00991         spring->restlen =  restlength;
00992         spring->type = spring_type;
00993         spring->flags = 0;
00994         spring->stiffness = 0;
00995         
00996         cloth->numsprings++;
00997     
00998         BLI_linklist_prepend ( &cloth->springs, spring );
00999         
01000         return 1;
01001     }
01002     return 0;
01003 }
01004 
01005 static void cloth_free_errorsprings(Cloth *cloth, EdgeHash *UNUSED(edgehash), LinkNode **edgelist)
01006 {
01007     unsigned int i = 0;
01008     
01009     if ( cloth->springs != NULL )
01010     {
01011         LinkNode *search = cloth->springs;
01012         while (search)
01013         {
01014             ClothSpring *spring = search->link;
01015                         
01016             MEM_freeN ( spring );
01017             search = search->next;
01018         }
01019         BLI_linklist_free(cloth->springs, NULL);
01020         
01021         cloth->springs = NULL;
01022     }
01023     
01024     if (edgelist)
01025     {
01026         for ( i = 0; i < cloth->numverts; i++ )
01027         {
01028             BLI_linklist_free ( edgelist[i],NULL );
01029         }
01030 
01031         MEM_freeN ( edgelist );
01032     }
01033     
01034     if (cloth->edgehash)
01035         BLI_edgehash_free ( cloth->edgehash, NULL );
01036 }
01037 
01038 static int cloth_build_springs ( ClothModifierData *clmd, DerivedMesh *dm )
01039 {
01040     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
01041     ClothSpring *spring = NULL, *tspring = NULL, *tspring2 = NULL;
01042     unsigned int struct_springs = 0, shear_springs=0, bend_springs = 0;
01043     unsigned int i = 0;
01044     unsigned int numverts = (unsigned int)dm->getNumVerts ( dm );
01045     unsigned int numedges = (unsigned int)dm->getNumEdges ( dm );
01046     unsigned int numfaces = (unsigned int)dm->getNumTessFaces ( dm );
01047     MEdge *medge = dm->getEdgeArray ( dm );
01048     MFace *mface = dm->getTessFaceArray ( dm );
01049     int index2 = 0; // our second vertex index
01050     LinkNode **edgelist = NULL;
01051     EdgeHash *edgehash = NULL;
01052     LinkNode *search = NULL, *search2 = NULL;
01053     
01054     // error handling
01055     if ( numedges==0 )
01056         return 0;
01057 
01058     cloth->springs = NULL;
01059 
01060     edgelist = MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( LinkNode * ) * numverts, "cloth_edgelist_alloc" );
01061     
01062     if (!edgelist)
01063         return 0;
01064     
01065     for ( i = 0; i < numverts; i++ )
01066     {
01067         edgelist[i] = NULL;
01068     }
01069 
01070     if ( cloth->springs )
01071         MEM_freeN ( cloth->springs );
01072 
01073     // create spring network hash
01074     edgehash = BLI_edgehash_new();
01075 
01076     // structural springs
01077     for ( i = 0; i < numedges; i++ )
01078     {
01079         spring = ( ClothSpring * ) MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( ClothSpring ), "cloth spring" );
01080 
01081         if ( spring )
01082         {
01083             spring->ij = MIN2(medge[i].v1, medge[i].v2);
01084             spring->kl = MAX2(medge[i].v2, medge[i].v1);
01085             spring->restlen = len_v3v3(cloth->verts[spring->kl].xrest, cloth->verts[spring->ij].xrest);
01086             clmd->sim_parms->avg_spring_len += spring->restlen;
01087             cloth->verts[spring->ij].avg_spring_len += spring->restlen;
01088             cloth->verts[spring->kl].avg_spring_len += spring->restlen;
01089             cloth->verts[spring->ij].spring_count++;
01090             cloth->verts[spring->kl].spring_count++;
01091             spring->type = CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_STRUCTURAL;
01092             spring->flags = 0;
01093             spring->stiffness = (cloth->verts[spring->kl].struct_stiff + cloth->verts[spring->ij].struct_stiff) / 2.0f;
01094             struct_springs++;
01095             
01096             BLI_linklist_prepend ( &cloth->springs, spring );
01097         }
01098         else {
01099             cloth_free_errorsprings(cloth, edgehash, edgelist);
01100             return 0;
01101         }
01102     }
01103     
01104     if (struct_springs > 0)
01105         clmd->sim_parms->avg_spring_len /= struct_springs;
01106     
01107     for (i = 0; i < numverts; i++)
01108     {
01109         cloth->verts[i].avg_spring_len = cloth->verts[i].avg_spring_len * 0.49f / ((float)cloth->verts[i].spring_count);
01110     }
01111     
01112     // shear springs
01113     for ( i = 0; i < numfaces; i++ )
01114     {
01115         // triangle faces already have shear springs due to structural geometry
01116         if ( !mface[i].v4 )
01117             continue; 
01118         
01119         spring = ( ClothSpring *) MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( ClothSpring ), "cloth spring" );
01120         
01121         if (!spring)
01122         {
01123             cloth_free_errorsprings(cloth, edgehash, edgelist);
01124             return 0;
01125         }
01126 
01127         spring->ij = MIN2(mface[i].v1, mface[i].v3);
01128         spring->kl = MAX2(mface[i].v3, mface[i].v1);
01129         spring->restlen = len_v3v3(cloth->verts[spring->kl].xrest, cloth->verts[spring->ij].xrest);
01130         spring->type = CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_SHEAR;
01131         spring->stiffness = (cloth->verts[spring->kl].shear_stiff + cloth->verts[spring->ij].shear_stiff) / 2.0f;
01132 
01133         BLI_linklist_append ( &edgelist[spring->ij], spring );
01134         BLI_linklist_append ( &edgelist[spring->kl], spring );
01135         shear_springs++;
01136 
01137         BLI_linklist_prepend ( &cloth->springs, spring );
01138 
01139         
01140         // if ( mface[i].v4 ) --> Quad face
01141         spring = ( ClothSpring * ) MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( ClothSpring ), "cloth spring" );
01142         
01143         if (!spring)
01144         {
01145             cloth_free_errorsprings(cloth, edgehash, edgelist);
01146             return 0;
01147         }
01148 
01149         spring->ij = MIN2(mface[i].v2, mface[i].v4);
01150         spring->kl = MAX2(mface[i].v4, mface[i].v2);
01151         spring->restlen = len_v3v3(cloth->verts[spring->kl].xrest, cloth->verts[spring->ij].xrest);
01152         spring->type = CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_SHEAR;
01153         spring->stiffness = (cloth->verts[spring->kl].shear_stiff + cloth->verts[spring->ij].shear_stiff) / 2.0f;
01154 
01155         BLI_linklist_append ( &edgelist[spring->ij], spring );
01156         BLI_linklist_append ( &edgelist[spring->kl], spring );
01157         shear_springs++;
01158 
01159         BLI_linklist_prepend ( &cloth->springs, spring );
01160     }
01161     
01162     if (numfaces) {
01163         // bending springs
01164         search2 = cloth->springs;
01165         for ( i = struct_springs; i < struct_springs+shear_springs; i++ )
01166         {
01167             if ( !search2 )
01168                 break;
01169 
01170             tspring2 = search2->link;
01171             search = edgelist[tspring2->kl];
01172             while ( search )
01173             {
01174                 tspring = search->link;
01175                 index2 = ( ( tspring->ij==tspring2->kl ) ? ( tspring->kl ) : ( tspring->ij ) );
01176                 
01177                 // check for existing spring
01178                 // check also if startpoint is equal to endpoint
01179                 if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(edgehash, MIN2(tspring2->ij, index2), MAX2(tspring2->ij, index2)) &&
01180                     (index2 != tspring2->ij))
01181                 {
01182                     spring = ( ClothSpring * ) MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( ClothSpring ), "cloth spring" );
01183                     
01184                     if (!spring)
01185                     {
01186                         cloth_free_errorsprings(cloth, edgehash, edgelist);
01187                         return 0;
01188                     }
01189 
01190                     spring->ij = MIN2(tspring2->ij, index2);
01191                     spring->kl = MAX2(tspring2->ij, index2);
01192                     spring->restlen = len_v3v3(cloth->verts[spring->kl].xrest, cloth->verts[spring->ij].xrest);
01193                     spring->type = CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_BENDING;
01194                     spring->stiffness = (cloth->verts[spring->kl].bend_stiff + cloth->verts[spring->ij].bend_stiff) / 2.0f;
01195                     BLI_edgehash_insert ( edgehash, spring->ij, spring->kl, NULL );
01196                     bend_springs++;
01197 
01198                     BLI_linklist_prepend ( &cloth->springs, spring );
01199                 }
01200                 search = search->next;
01201             }
01202             search2 = search2->next;
01203         }
01204     }
01205     else if (struct_springs > 2) {
01206         /* bending springs for hair strands */
01207         /* The current algorightm only goes through the edges in order of the mesh edges list   */
01208         /* and makes springs between the outer vert of edges sharing a vertice. This works just */
01209         /* fine for hair, but not for user generated string meshes. This could/should be later  */
01210         /* extended to work with non-ordered edges so that it can be used for general "rope     */
01211         /* dynamics" without the need for the vertices or edges to be ordered through the length*/
01212         /* of the strands. -jahka */
01213         search = cloth->springs;
01214         search2 = search->next;
01215         while (search && search2)
01216         {
01217             tspring = search->link;
01218             tspring2 = search2->link;
01219 
01220             if (tspring->ij == tspring2->kl) {
01221                 spring = ( ClothSpring * ) MEM_callocN ( sizeof ( ClothSpring ), "cloth spring" );
01222                 
01223                 if (!spring)
01224                 {
01225                     cloth_free_errorsprings(cloth, edgehash, edgelist);
01226                     return 0;
01227                 }
01228 
01229                 spring->ij = tspring2->ij;
01230                 spring->kl = tspring->kl;
01231                 spring->restlen = len_v3v3(cloth->verts[spring->kl].xrest, cloth->verts[spring->ij].xrest);
01232                 spring->type = CLOTH_SPRING_TYPE_BENDING;
01233                 spring->stiffness = (cloth->verts[spring->kl].bend_stiff + cloth->verts[spring->ij].bend_stiff) / 2.0f;
01234                 bend_springs++;
01235 
01236                 BLI_linklist_prepend ( &cloth->springs, spring );
01237             }
01238             
01239             search = search->next;
01240             search2 = search2->next;
01241         }
01242     }
01243     
01244     /* insert other near springs in edgehash AFTER bending springs are calculated (for selfcolls) */
01245     for ( i = 0; i < numedges; i++ ) // struct springs
01246         BLI_edgehash_insert ( edgehash, MIN2(medge[i].v1, medge[i].v2), MAX2(medge[i].v2, medge[i].v1), NULL );
01247     
01248     for ( i = 0; i < numfaces; i++ ) // edge springs
01249     {
01250         if (mface[i].v4)
01251         {
01252             BLI_edgehash_insert ( edgehash, MIN2(mface[i].v1, mface[i].v3), MAX2(mface[i].v3, mface[i].v1), NULL );
01253             
01254             BLI_edgehash_insert ( edgehash, MIN2(mface[i].v2, mface[i].v4), MAX2(mface[i].v2, mface[i].v4), NULL );
01255         }
01256     }
01257     
01258     
01259     cloth->numsprings = struct_springs + shear_springs + bend_springs;
01260     
01261     if ( edgelist )
01262     {
01263         for ( i = 0; i < numverts; i++ )
01264         {
01265             BLI_linklist_free ( edgelist[i],NULL );
01266         }
01267     
01268         MEM_freeN ( edgelist );
01269     }
01270     
01271     cloth->edgehash = edgehash;
01272     
01273     if (G.rt>0)
01274         printf("avg_len: %f\n",clmd->sim_parms->avg_spring_len);
01275 
01276     return 1;
01277 
01278 } /* cloth_build_springs */
01279 /***************************************************************************************
01280 * SPRING NETWORK BUILDING IMPLEMENTATION END
01281 ***************************************************************************************/
01282
Generated on Tue Nov 13 2012 11:54:11 for Blender by  doxygen 1.7.4
